title: S3 Ep8: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 5 – Pulpwooder's Hands
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 5 – Pulpwooder's Hands
description:
August 9, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this week's addendum with Susan, Colin, and guest Scott Reeder of the Suspect Convictions podcast, to discuss Episodes 3, 4, and 4 of Season 3, as well as Scott Reeder's upcoming series on the re-trial of Stanley Liggins.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by Blue Apron.

www.BlueApron.com/Undisclosed 

#undisclosed #udaddendum #freedennisperry
